CustomField.formula: IF ( OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Approved"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Approved & Fulfilled"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Cancelled"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Merged"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "My Product on Demand (with sku) created"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Not Interested"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Successful") ), ClosedDate - CreatedDate , NOW() - CreatedDate )
CustomField.label: Request Age (days)
